member.name: M:NokLib.ObjectPoolBase`1.Get
member.summary: Get a pooled instance of the object, if no allocated instance is available, a new instance is allocated. If there are no allocated instances left and the pools capacity has been reached, a LimitReachedException is thrown

member.name: M:NokLib.ObjectPoolBase`1.SafeGet
member.summary: Get a pooled instance of the object wrapped in PooledObject, use with the 'using' keyword for the object to be automatically released

member.name: M:NokLib.ObjectPoolBase`1.TryGet(`0@)
member.summary: Attempt to get a pooled instance of the object, if no allocated instance is available, a new instance is allocated.
member.returns: False if a new instance needs to be allocated, but pools capacity has been reached. Otherwise returns true

member.name: M:NokLib.ObjectPoolBase`1.TrySafeGet(NokLib.PooledObject{`0}@)
member.summary: Try to get a pooled instance of the object wrapped in PooledObject, use with the 'using' keyword for the object to be automatically released

member.name: M:NokLib.ObjectPoolBase`1.Release(`0)
member.summary: Releases the object back to the pool, if DuplicateChecking is enabled and the object has already been released a DuplicateObjectInCollectionException is thrown
member.param: The object to be released

member.name: M:NokLib.ObjectPoolBase`1.Clear
member.summary: Calls the OnDispose method (if specified) for each allocated object and clears the pool. If no OnDispose method was specified and the item type stored in this pool implements IDisposable interface the objects Dispose method is called instead

member.name: M:NokLib.ObjectPoolBase`1.HasBeenReturned(`0)

member.summary: Converts boolean to an integer (false = 0, true = 1) trough pointer magic, which is as fast as it can get (two processor instructions)

member.summary: Converts an enum object to long using pointer magic, which is very fast Credit

member.name: M:NokLib.UnsafeCastingExtensions.ToIntFast``1(``0,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Converts an enum object to int using pointer magic, which is very fast (usually one processor instruction) Credit
member.param: Force conversion of types too large to fit into an int, CAN RESULT IN DATA LOSS
member.exception: Thrown when the enum type is backed by an 8 byte value (eg. long/ulong), as int fits only 4 bytes

member.name: M:NokLib.UnsafeCastingExtensions.ToEnumFast``1(System.Int64)
member.summary: Converts an enum object to long using pointer magic, which is very fast (usually one processor instruction) Credit

member.summary: Converts an enum object to long using pointer magic, which is very fast (usually one processor instruction) Credit

member.summary: Converts an enum object to long using pointer magic, which is very fast (usually one processor instruction) Credit

member.name: M:NokLib.UnsafeCastingExtensions.ToEnumFast``1(System.Byte)
member.summary: Converts an enum object to long using pointer magic, which is very fast (usually one processor instruction) Credit
